item.title: Approximation Algorithm
item.description: def. Approximation Factor. α(n)-level approximation. For optimization problem π, ALG is a α-level optimization algorithm iff for input I of size n: max[OPT(I)ALG(I)​,ALG(I)OPT(I)​]=α(n) Smaller is better! Constant approximation factor: if approximation factor doesn’t depend on n, ALG is a constant α-level approximation .
